torch 0.0.1.9000
  • Reference

bmm

Source: R/tensor.R
tch_bmm.Rd

Performs a batch matrix-matrix product of matrices stored in batch1 and batch2.

tch_bmm(x, mat2)

Examples

x <- tensor(array(runif(120), dim = c(10, 3, 4)))
y <- tensor(array(runif(200), dim = c(10, 4, 5)))
tch_bmm(x, y)
